name: Jeff's No. 1 Bass Fishing
summary: Jeff’s No.1 Bass Fishing was a response to the Shigesato Itoi #1 Bass Fishing Localization project, an April Fools event back in 2012. Started and completed in a mere 10 hours, Jeff’s No.1 Bass Fishing was a runaway international success and its influences on society and world culture can even be seen in your own household today.
